Annotation.String: The Event Service resource contains properties for managing event subcriptions and generates the events sent to subscribers. The resource has links to the actual collection of subscriptions (called Event Destinations).
This action is used to generate a test event.
This action shall add a test event to the event service with the event data specified in the action parameters. This message should then be sent to any appropriate ListenerDestination targets.
This is the type of event to be added.
This defines the property name for which the following allowable values apply.
This is the ID of event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the EventId property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This is the time stamp of event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the EventId property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This is the Severity of event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the Severity property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This is the human readable message of event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the Message property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This is the message ID of event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the MessageId property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This is the array of message arguments of the event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the MessageArgs property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This is the OriginOfCondition property of event to be added.
This property has the same semantics as the OriginOfCondition property in the Event schema for Redfish.
This indicates whether this service is enabled.
The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is enabled.
This is the number of attempts an event posting is retried before the subscription is terminated.
The value of this property shall be the number of retrys attempted for any given event to the subscription destination before the subscription is terminated.
This represents the number of seconds between retry attempts for sending any given Event
The value of this property shall be the interval in seconds between the retry attempts for any given event to the subscription destination.
This is the types of Events that can be subscribed to.
The value of this property shall be the types of events that subscriptions can subscribe to. The semantics associated with the enumerations values are defined in the Redfish specification.
The available actions for this resource.
The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
This is a reference to a collection of Event Destination resources.
The value of this property shall contain the link to a collection of type EventDestinationCollection.
